CYYZ.rawOb: CYYZ 110400Z 26006KT 15SM SKC M09/M13 A3035 RMK SLP292
CYYZ.weather_description: Good evening, Toronto! At Pearson International Airport, we're looking at chilly conditions tonight with a temperature of -9 °C. The relative humidity is sitting at a comfortable 72.7%, which may make it feel a bit cooler outside. We've got a light wind blowing from the north at 11.1 km/h, so make sure to bundle up if you're heading out. Stay warm and have a great evening!

OMDB.weather_description: Good evening! Here’s the weather update from Dubai Intl. Currently, the temperature is a comfortable 18 °C with a relative humidity sitting at 59.5%. It feels quite pleasant out there! The winds are blowing gently at 7.4 km/h, making it a lovely evening to be outdoors. Whether you’re heading out for dinner or just relaxing at home, the weather is certainly on your side!

LTFM.weather_description: Good day from Istanbul Arpt! We are currently experiencing chilly conditions with a temperature of just 1 °C. The skies are cloudy, bringing us moderate showers of snow, so be sure to bundle up if you're heading outside! Winds are picking up, gusting at about 25.9 km/h, which could make it feel even colder. Stay warm and safe out there!

KLAX.rawOb: KLAX 110353Z 26004KT 10SM FEW028 OVC035 13/09 A3002 RMK AO2 CIG 028 RWY24 SLP165 T01330094 $
KLAX.weather_description: Good evening! Here’s the latest weather update for Los Angeles International Airport. We’re currently observing a mild temperature of 13.3 °C, which feels quite comfortable. The relative humidity is at a notable 77.2%, giving us a bit of that moist feel in the air. As for the wind, it’s gently blowing at 7.4 km/h, so you might want to grab a light jacket if you're headed out. Overall, it’s a pleasant evening in LA, perfect for a stroll outside!

WIII.weather_description: Good evening from Jakarta! Today, we’re experiencing warm conditions with a temperature of 30 °C. The relative humidity is at a comfortable level of 70.3%, making it feel a bit muggy, so you might want to stay hydrated. Winds are coming in from the east at a brisk 22.2 km/h, providing a nice relief from that heat. Overall, it’s a typical tropical day here in Jakarta, so whether you’re out and about or enjoying some time indoors, make sure to keep cool!
